channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NTSB to give update on deadly D.C. midair collision investigation
item.description: The NTSB is expected to give an update on the midair collision between a passenger plane and helicopter over Washington, D.C. in January.

item.title: Judge to hear arguments on Pentagon's transgender service member ban
item.description: A group of service members are going to court to fight the Trump administration's new ban on transgender troops. CBS News senior national security cor...

item.title: Greenland's election: Why does it matter and how does it work?
item.description: Five of the six parties favour Greenland's independence from Denmark, differing only on how quickly that should come about.

item.title: Trump warns that arrest of Palestinian activist at Columbia will be ‘first of many’
What is known about the deadly January air crash between a passenger jet and US Army helicopter
How bad could the North Sea tanker collision be for the environment?
item.description: An environmental group in the U.K. says the North Sea tanker collision could become a "disaster in really important protected areas."

item.title: Dow drops nearly 600 points as Trump escalates trade war with Canada
item.description: Following Monday's rout on Wall Street, stocks extended their slide after President Trump ramped up his trade war with Canada.

item.title: Philippines ex-leader Duterte on plane to the Hague after arrest
item.description: The ICC accuses him of "crimes against humanity" in a drugs crackdown that left thousands dead.

item.title: Maradona medical team on trial for football icon's death
item.description: Prosecutors say the Argentine legend's death could have been avoided and accuse hospital staff of negligence.

item.title: Green card holders' rights in spotlight after arrest of pro-Palestinian activist
item.description: A New York federal judge is set to hear pivotal questions in the case of Mahmoud Khalil, a leader of large Gaza solidarity protests at Columbia Univer...

item.title: Pakistan militants attack train and take passengers hostage
item.description: Police say at least three people were injured in the attack and it is unclear how many people are being held hostage.

item.title: Moving Palestinians out of Gaza? Trump's idea takes on a life of its own in Israel
item.description: Arab countries reject Gaza displacement as ethnic cleansing, but Israeli officials say they are working on plans to make it happen, and polls suggest ...

item.title: Trump doubles planned tariffs on Canadian steel and aluminum to 50% as trade war intensifies
item.description: President Donald Trump says he will double his planned tariffs on steel and aluminum from 25% to 50% for Canada, escalating a trade war with the Unite...

item.title: Portugal elections loom as MPs hold confidence vote
item.description: PM Luís Montenegro is set to lose a vote of confidence, pitching his country into a third election in as many years.

item.title: Trump announces double tariffs on Canadian steel and aluminum
item.description: President Trump said it plans to put a 50% tariff on steel and aluminum from Canada in an escalation of recent trade tensions between the countries.

item.title: Airbus investigating corrosion issues on some of its passenger jets
item.description: Corrosion issues have been found on what Airbus calls a "limited population" of its A220 passenger jets, including some operated by U.S. airlines.

item.title: Bags fly for a fee: Southwest Airlines cancels its free checked luggage perk
item.description: The carrier announced Tuesday that it will begin charging certain passengers to check their luggage on flights, a significant shift at the company lon...

item.title: Ukraine wants 'constructive, friendly' talks with the U.S. as they meet in Saudi Arabia
item.description: Diplomatic teams from Ukraine and the United States are holding talks in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, on Tuesday in steps toward ending a full-scale war star...
